After running a totally partisan and closed impeachment process in the House, @SpeakerPelosi now wants an open and bipartisan process in the Senate? That is the height of political hypocrisy! -TC

It's been a roller coaster of a week. Apart from the news dominating the partisan vote on articles of impeachment last night, the House actually got a lot of bipartisan work done this week. More in my weekly chat ⬇️ https://youtu.be/CBbznemvIzM

While it is long overdue, I am proud that the House finally advanced #USMCA, an historic trade deal skillfully negotiated and secured by @POTUS that delivers real benefits to American job creators, workers and consumers. https://cole.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/cole-statement-house-passage-usmca …
